name: Pinang Slimber
description:
Pinang Slimber comes from the Indonesian traditional game "panjat pinang" that is conducted every year. Panjat pinang means climbing an areca tree to its highest point. In this game, our main character slime is trying to do panjat pinang game.

Collect all the flags and how far can he go? let see you guys score.

[HOW TO PLAY]
★ Swipe down the screen to climb pinang.
★ Swipe right or left to switch between sides.
★ Collect all flag you can get.
★ Avoid all obstacle like oil, food, and even a thunderstrike.

[FEATURE]
★ Share result to your sosial media

Collect all the flag and how far can he go? let see you guys score.

#17Agustus
